body_html: @dlmacedo @SsnL I guess that the batch indices cannot be deterministically matched with worker ids when multiple workers exist since the idling workers grab the next items in a queue which is based on CPU/memory/driver/... status. Feeding each worker with the same seed can reduce this uncertainty a lot.
